authors.author: St. Paul Students' Choir (University of Nairobi)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kwa maana angalieni
sasa yametimia (yale yote).
Manabii walotabiri
sasa yametokea (ona).

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Baba atamkana mama,
mama atamkana Baba.
Watoto ni hivyo hivyo,
tubuni tubuni sasa. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Magonjwa yasiyopona,
uasherati wazidi.
Uzinzi na ubakaji,
tubuni tubuni sasa. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Vita pande za dunia,
bila sababu yoyote.
Watu waabudu fedha,
tubuni tubuni sasa. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Njaa nayo itazidi,
ukame chakula hakuna.
Watu wateseka sana,
tubuni tubuni sasa. x2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Neno litahubiriwa,
pande zote za dunia.
Watu wamfuate nani,
tubuni tubuni sasa. x2

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Manabii wa uongo,
watazunguka dunia
Watawapotosha watu,
tubuni tubuni sasa. x2

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Tubuni Tubuni sasa,
tubuni tubuni sasa.
